name: Boing
description:
Long ago in the deepest and darkest of space, an ancient enemy scourged the universe causing mayhem and destruction. Then the Boing rose up and became the greatest defense to hold back the enemy.

Be the Boing and protect existence.

Inspired by strategic shooters of old you play as the Boing where you are the weapon. Enhance the Boing with upgrades and power ups allowing you to defend against more and more powerful enemies.

Play this fast paced casual action game and enjoy playing through forever
increasing stronger and smarter enemies that will keep you on your toes.

You are the BOING!

As the Boing

  • Play through over 200 levels
  • Enhance & maintain the Boing with upgrades and power ups
  • Play with keyboard, mouse or both that suits and enjoy the ambient feel from the soundtrack and the satisfying sound fx.
